content.title: Dental Care Scheme- Haryana Labour Welfare Board
content.beneficiary: Workers registered under the Haryana Labour Welfare Board
content.details: The Dental Care Scheme aims to provide dental care services to workers registered under the Haryana Labour Welfare Board.
eligibility: Must be a registered worker under the Haryana Labour Welfare Board
Must possess a valid Parivar Pehchan Patra (PPP) ID
content.application_process: Online application through the Labour Department Haryana website or Antyodaya-SARAL Portal.
